Package arcade.patch.vis

Class PatchColorMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.vis.PatchColorMaps
  • class PatchColorMaps
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for commonly used color maps.

    Uses Colors to define mappings.
